p: A review of oral PrEP related studies revealed an implementation study where a 41% decrease in condom use amongst a subset of PrEP users was found [ 8, 9]. Despite this, no new HIV infections among PrEP users were observed [ 9]. Safer sex practices, especially in the first 20â€‰days for vaginal receptive sex whilst PrEP drug levels are reaching steady state concentration, needs special attention.
